website_summaries.verdict: Although the scent could be better, this cold pressed oil does a good job moisturizing the skin, and has the added benefit of being organically and fair trade produced.
pros: Distances itself from others for being both USDA certified organic and fair trade produced
Absorbs nicely and makes skin feel moisturized
cons: The scent isn't very pleasant, and doesn't have the nutty smell that is typical of moringa oil
Comes with a pump that has been known to malfunction

customer_reviews.title: Amazing oil!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Organic Veda Premium Moringa Oil for about 8 months and it is amazing. I use on my face and neck and apply it morning and evening. My skin is smoother, healthier, more hydrated and brighter. Recently, I used the oil on an very bad scrape on my arm and was surprised to see how quickly it healed my damaged skin. I am now using it on my arms each day and expect to have the same results I had with my face...smoother, more supple, healthier skin. A little goes a long way, just one pump is enough for my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Deni H

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I've been diagnosed with a rare skin disorder and I've been using this oil and it has done wonders. I will continue ordering this product from you----the point that it is 100% pure and organic is important to me. I have tried others but this is the most effective for me.
customer_reviews.author: Velia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Arthritis pain for me and hubby gone is 5-10 minutes, wrinkles reducing!
customer_reviews.text: Pain in left middle finger (arthritis) gone in 5 minutes!! Cant believe it. Hubbys wrist and index finger gone quick too! Nothing has ever worked like this before. Pain pills dont work. My wrinkles diminishing after about a week!! Continuing to use gladly!! Will never run out of this Moringa oil. the 99 properties are amazing (amino acids & antioxidants etc.)! The body is designed to self correct and heal. Take this stuff! It works! Get the powder and put it in juices. Read up on Moringa!! It helps with almost everything ailing you even diseases! Research like I did. You will be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice on my hair. I only put 1 drop mixed in with conditioner. I find it relaxes my curls and leaves my hair soft and smooth. I do not like it on my face. I have read many people say it soaks right in. It doesn't. Even 1 drop is very heavy and does not absorb. I have also read that it's good for inflammation. I have carpal tunnel, tendonitis and tennis elbow. It did not work for my inflammation. A little goes a long way and this bottle will last at least 6 months I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far (I've only been using it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far (I've only been using it a short time) but in terms of therapeutic (anti-aging) effects, can't tell much. I mix it with organic rosehip oil and hyaluronic acid and it seems to be a good combination. I do like the nutrient profile and it's organic so that part is very good. I would've given 5 stars if it came in a glass bottle. I'll probably search for that next time I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Watson

customer_reviews.title: Not Moringa Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is cashew oil not moringa! I have purchased 100% moringa oil from another company out of Haiti...organic. It's thicker and has no smell. This one is very runny with a cashew oder. Stays on skin..does not penetrate like "real moringa". If u have a nut allergy..Beware
customer_reviews.author: LasVegasgal

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted with this oil and already recommended it to several ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of organic moringa oil. I am delighted with this oil and already recommended it to several friends. Thank you so much for this good product.
customer_reviews.author: Magola

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: This has fast become an invaluable part of my daily topical regimen, as well as for massages, in addition to oral Moringa capsules and moringa tea in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Folake Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I've seen great results.
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered the benefits of moringa oil. This is a grate brand, does have a peculiar scent but nothing I can't handle. I use in in the morning or at night, massaging it into my face and neck. I let it set for a few minutes before washing. I've seen great results.
customer_reviews.author: Adeana

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for moisturizing my face everyday. I don't use anything else to keep my complexion clear. I highly recommend this product. It is worth every cent!!!

I have acne-prone skin and suffer from severe cystic acne developing around my chins, but ever since I used this oil (it's been about 2 weeks), I no longer have major pimples on my face. It keeps my skin moisturized throughout the day too. I've used it for scalps and it's great at preventing hair loss too. Moringa must surely be a gift from God!

customer_reviews.text: This is great for very dry skin. I use it a few times a week on my face (in between Retinol days) and it leaves my face super soft and smooth. What I'm most impressed with is how it's helped heal my hands. For some reason every winter my fingers on my right hand peel, crack and bleed. I've tried everything under the sun to heal, including prescription lotions and wearing white gloves at night. The Moringa OIl works better than anything I've tried thus far - very healing!

I have purchased other more expensive products (nothing that expensive) and find this one to work better than any of them. I start with a dab of pure aloe and add a few drops of moringa and then massage it in. Even as a 50 something man, I get complements on my skin and hair all the time. KT Garron RN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Very impressed with this oil
customer_reviews.text: I had already had great results health wise with the Moringa leaf capsules. Then decided to try the oil. I have only had this oil a couple of days and already i love i! I have recently been very ill and as a result my skin and hair were very dry and flaky. I have only used this a few times in the last few days and already my skin looks better and the dryness and flakiness is gone. I am also using it on recent surgical scars. I am already seeing an improvement and surgery was 5 days ago. This stuff is a miracle oil! Also the size and price is very good. I am telling all my friends.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! I have been using it for some time ...

For whatever it is worth I also use the powder in my daily smoothies (is smoothies really a word?) which is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zavattero

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Be Careful With Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The actual oil is very good for dry skin/acne/ etc. I was very disappointed though when I got my package to find that a good amount of oil spilled out of the container (in the box). When I picked up the container I had to wipe off all the excess oil surrounding it and then I realized the oil was leaking from the top (the dispenser). Right now I am still keeping it in a zip lock baggie because the container is still oily. Overall good product but I had a bad experience with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria R.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, and you will too
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 2yrs. Tried another brand, but immediately came back to this. LOVE IT, and you will too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Organic Moringa Premium Oil - Cold Pressed (100ml 3.4 fl.oz). 100% Natural and Pure Oil. USDA Certified Organic. For Skin, Hair, Scalp, Nails, Foot and Massage.
product_meta.description:
ORGANIC MORINGA OIL 
SUPERIOR QUALITY - COLD PRESSED ★ 100% PURE, RAW and NATURAL ★ FRESH, HIGHLY POTENT AND GENUINE ★ NO THIRD PARTY SOURCING

★ NUTRIENT RICH - Organically grown, Hand Harvested, Naturally Processed by Experts 
★ MORINGA OIL at its best - From the Moringa Experts and Trusted for Decades. Grown in SOUTH INDIA, Moringa's Native Soil. Moringa Grown in South India is Highly Potent and Beneficial. 
★ DIRECT from own Farm - NOT made out of materials from traders/bulk supplement suppliers etc. No third party sourcing. Farm to Table direct 
★ FROM THE PIONEER OF MORINGA PRODUCTS AND MORINGA SPECIALTY COMPANY! 

OUR MORINGA PRODUCTS FOR OTHER APPLICATIONS 

★ MORINGA POWDER and CAPSULES - Use our Moringa Capsules and Powders for variety of health benefits. 
★ MORINGA TEA - Use our 13 FLAVORS of Moringa Tea bags and Loose Tea for Refreshments and Energy boosters 
★ MORINGA SOAP - Use our 4 variety of Moringa Soap for daily care and body care 
★ MORINGA BEAUTY CARE - Use our Moringa Anti Aging cream , Moringa Moisturizer, Moringa Body Butter, Moringa Lotion, Moringa Virgin Coconut Oil, Moringa Beuaty Oil for Daily and Personnel Care 


BENEFITS OF MORINGA 

★ MIRACLE TREE - The world's most nutritious tree 'Moringa leaf' contains approximately 20 types of amino acids, 46 types of antioxidants, 36 anti-inflammatory compounds 
★ All natural 90+ nutrients make for the best natural nutritional supplement 
★ It is a tremendous source of bio-available vitamins and minerals like Vitamin A, Vitamin B, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B3, Vitamin B6, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin E and Macro Minerals, Trace Minerals and Phyto nutrients. 
★ 100% Money back guaranteed for life time of the product. If you are not satisfied, simply return and get your money back!
feature_bullets: ★ All NATURAL Cold Pressed Organic Moringa Seeds Oil from the Pioneer of Moringa Products and Moringa Speciality company. Nutrient-dense oil is famous for Skin, Hair and Scalp application. Removes wrinkles and prevents the sagging of facial skin as well. It comes filled with antioxidants that slow the aging process down and help curb the activity of free radicals. Also fights acne, black heads and dark spots.
★ Exceptional in anti ageing properties; Radiance boosting fatty acids. Promotes Healthy Skin. Rich in Palmitoleic, Oleic, Linoleic acids and unsaturated fatty acids. Vitamins A and C

★ NON GMO, Fairly traded, No preservatives, No artificial substances, 100% USDA Organic and EU Organic Certified. 100% Pure and Natural. Not from third party sourced, manufactured and distributed by World's #1 Moringa product company. Read our reviews over many years. Most trusted brand world wide for 25 years.

★ Rated best in the industry - 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. Antioxidant-Rich Moisturizer. Guaranteed Purity, Potent and Fresh. Check yourself the difference and experience superior quality moringa oil from its origin South India.
★ Moringa oil has excellent moisturizing and nourishing qualities. Moringa oil is the most stable oil in nature and it does not go rancid.
